metadata.instructions: Use WebFetch tool with each prompt to systematically scrape all data

recipe_scraping_tasks.prompt:
I need you to extract complete recipe data for these 10 Sulfur recipes. For each recipe, extract:

RECIPES TO SCRAPE:
- Admiral White Extra Strong
- Anti-Poison Gum
- Aspic
- Banana Bread
- Banana Sulfs
- Bark Bread
- Beef Jerky
- Berry Jam
- Berry Jam (Unsweetened)
- Berry Milkshake

For each recipe, visit its wiki page and extract:
1. Name, Description, Category (Consumable/Throwable/Equipment)
2. Grid size, Image URL (full sulfur.wiki.gg URL)
3. All effects with values and durations
4. Selling value, Buying value, Vendors list  
5. ALL recipe variations with exact ingredients and quantities
6. Complete ingredients list with quantities for each variation

Return structured JSON for each recipe with this exact format:
{
  "name": "Recipe Name",
  "type": "Consumable|Throwable|Equipment",
  "gridSize": "1x1",
  "imageUrl": "https://sulfur.wiki.gg/images/...",
  "description": "Complete description text",
  "effects": [
    {"type": "Effect Name", "value": "+X%", "duration": "X seconds"}
  ],
  "economic": {
    "sellingValue": X,
    "buyingValue": X,
    "vendors": ["Vendor Name"]
  },
  "recipes": [
    {
      "ingredients": [
        {"item": "Ingredient Name", "quantity": X}
      ],
      "output": X
    }
  ]
}

Be systematic and thorough - get ALL data for each recipe.

ingredient_scraping_tasks.prompt:
I need you to extract complete ingredient data for these 15 Sulfur ingredients. For each ingredient, extract:

INGREDIENTS TO SCRAPE:
- Anti-Poison Gum
- Banana
- Bark
- Bark Bread
- Beans
- Beef Jerky
- Berries
- Berry Jam
- Black Pepper
- Bladder
- Bleach
- Blood
- Bone
- Bottled Caviar
- Bottled Water

For each ingredient, visit its wiki page and extract:
1. Name, Description, Type  
2. Grid size, Image URL (full sulfur.wiki.gg URL)
3. Selling value, Buying value, Vendors list
4. "Used In" recipes list
5. Any special properties or crafting information

Return structured JSON for each ingredient with this exact format:
{
  "name": "Ingredient Name",
  "description": "Complete description text",
  "type": "Ingredient category or type",
  "gridSize": "1x1", 
  "imageUrl": "https://sulfur.wiki.gg/images/...",
  "economic": {
    "sellingValue": X,
    "buyingValue": X, 
    "vendors": ["Vendor Name"]
  },
  "usedIn": ["Recipe Name 1", "Recipe Name 2"]
}

Be systematic and thorough - get ALL data for each ingredient.
